content.question: The "dyspeptic alderman" (middle of third paragraph) is presented as an illustration of

choices.label: the pain endured by one who succumbs to temptation
restrained behavior that is not driven by moral compunctions
admirable behavior that has gone unrecognized
the effect of an empty stomach on one's conscience

content.answer: restrained behavior that is not driven by moral compunctions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
